snippet: The death of Dimitris Christoulas, a divorced and retired pharmacist, has prompted a public outpouring, as well as comment from politicians across the spectrum.
abstract: Death of Dimitris Christoulas, Greek pensioner who shot himself in the head outside the Parliament in despair over his financial problems, prompts a public and political outpouring of grief and anger throughout the austerity-weary country.
lead_paragraph: The death of Dimitris Christoulas, a divorced and retired pharmacist, has prompted a public outpouring, as well as comment from politicians across the spectrum.

headline.seo: Dimitris Christoulas’s Suicide Continues to Shake Greece
headline.main: Pensioner’s Suicide Continues to Shake Greece
headline.print_headline: Greece Shaken by Man’s Suicide Outside Parliament
